SELECT RESERVATION_NO FROM RESERVATION WHERE LANTOUR_NO = #{lantour_no} AND RESERVATION_DATE = #{reservation_date} AND RESERVATION_PAY != 'cancelled'

SELECT RESERVATION_NO,LANTOUR_NO,ROOM_NO,HOTEL_NO,MEMBER_NO,RESERVATION_DATE,RESERVATION_CHECKOUT_DATE,RESERVATION_PRICE, RESERVATION_PAY,RESERVATION_PAYDATE FROM RESERVATION WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET RESERVATION_PAY=#{reservation_pay}, RESERVATION_PAYDATE = SYSDATE WHERE RESERVATION_NO = #{reservation_no}
mapper.select: SELECT RESERVATION_NO, LANTOUR_NO, ROOM_NO, HOTEL_NO, MEMBER_NO, RESERVATION_DATE, RESERVATION_CHECKOUT_DATE, RESERVATION_PRICE, RESERVATION_PAY, RESERVATION_PAYDATE FROM RESERVATION WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} AND LANTOUR_NO IS NOT NULL AND RESERVATION_PAY != 'cancelled'

SELECT RESERVATION_NO, LANTOUR_NO, ROOM_NO, HOTEL_NO, MEMBER_NO, RESERVATION_DATE, RESERVATION_CHECKOUT_DATE, RESERVATION_PRICE, RESERVATION_PAY, RESERVATION_PAYDATE FROM RESERVATION WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no} AND HOTEL_NO IS NOT NULL AND RESERVATION_PAY != 'cancelled'

SELECT R.HOTEL_NO FROM RESERVATION R, HOTEL H WHERE TO_DATE(R.RESERVATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >=TO_DATE(#{check_in},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(R.RESERVATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < TO_DATE(#{check_out},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND R.HOTEL_NO IS NOT NULL AND R.HOTEL_NO = H.HOTEL_NO AND H.HOTEL_TYPE = #{hotel_type} GROUP BY R.HOTEL_NO ORDER BY R.HOTEL_NO
